sig_info: Black Widow strikes her targets with subtle, calculated grace, reducing the chance of triggering their abilities by 20 to 69.99%. This chance is increased by 15% against Science champions, and decreased by the same against Mutants.

WHEN ATTACKED: 3% chance to automatically dodge incoming attacks.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: 100% chance to boost Critical Rating by 400 for 8 seconds.
100% chance to increase Critical Damage Rating by 900 for 8 seconds.
